name: The Arena of Destruction
description:
Fight your way through the arena. Beat your friend's score and most off all survive.

You play as a robot. your only goal is to survive the Arena. fight hordes of robot's to get the highest score.   

This game is in early acces. there is a lot of content i'm still going to add. which include:

  • new enemy's
  • a different map
  • little changes to the gameplay
  • and a lot more.

i might make a story mode too. But that's uncertained.

If you find any bugs or glitches please let me know. idea's for futher game updates are welcome. 

note: someone told me the game wasn't starting so i looked at it and it should work perfectly fine now.
